instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Remove all existing paint or coating by manual or mechanical methods.
Hammer all nails deep enough to apply putty.
Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch.
Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Apply BOYSEN®® Xyladecor™ to bare wood without primers or undercoats either by brush, spray or by dipping in an open trough or tank to achieve total covering rate. Shake and stir Xyladecor often during use. By Brush: Lightly brush or wipe over once along the grain to remove excess material and to smooth out any runs. Leave each coat for about 4-8 hours or until totally dry. Recoat for a darker shade. By Spray: Use a nozzle (about 1.5 mm) giving a stream of material. Working pressure should be approximately 40 psi. By Dipping: Dip the timber in BOYSEN®® Xyladecor™ for 2 minutes, varying the time required according to the absorbency of the wood. Stand the timber on end and allow to drain. If necessary, lightly brush the surface once in the direction of the grain before it dries.

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: If a very even colored finish is desired on the wooden substrate with varying degrees of absorbency, apply BOYSEN®® Xyladecor™ Colorless first before applying the colored varieties of Xyladecor. BOYSEN®® Xyladecor™ Colorless is not recommended for exterior use on its own.

calculator.title: Stain
calculator.note: Apply to bare wood without primers or undercoats.
